title: Inheritance wasn't distributed according to shariah, I got more money, what to do? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: finally salim says if the inheritance was not distributed according to sharia allah they gave me more what should i do should i give it in charity the answer is no take what's lawfully yours let's assume it's 50 000. and the remaining 70 000 which is more than what you're uh supposed to do you should distribute it to the actual heirs who got less than what they deserve so your sisters who did not get anything you should give it to them accordingly and allah knows best this
